summary: Lia and Tina are two beautiful girls who meet and realize that they have a lot in common. They are both young, beautiful and pissed off, so they decide to hitchhike their way to Rome to ... See full summary »
cast: Gloria Guida|Lilli Carati|Ray Lovelock|Vincenzo Crocitti|Giorgio Bracardi|Leopoldo Mastelloni|Carmelo Reale|Serena Bennato|Daniele Vargas|Vittorio Caprioli|Licinia Lentini|Daniela Doria|Raul Lovecchio|Fernando Cerulli|Camillo Chiara|Flora Carosello|Salvatore Billa|Omero Capanna|Eolo Capritti|Pietro Ceccarelli|Agostino Crisafulli|Paolo de Manincor|Fernando Di Leo|Sergio Di Pinto|Vinicio Diamanti|Lina Franchi|Gilberto Galimberti|Ettore Geri|Cindy Leadbetter|Franca Scagnetti
title: Las veinteañeras
